mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jwland.exam_type(year, month, exam_organization_sequence_no) VALUES(#{year}, #{month}, #{examOrganizationSequenceNo})
mapper.select:
SELECT exam_subject_sequence_no, subject FROM jwland.exam_subject
WHERE exam_subject_sequence_no = #{examSubjectSequenceNo}::INT
ORDER BY exam_subject_sequence_no

SELECT et.year, et.month, eo.exam_organization_name, em.problem_number, t1.wrong_count FROM jwland.exam_master em LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_type et ON em.exam_type_sequence_no = et.exam_type_sequence_no LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_organization eo ON et.exam_organization_sequence_no = eo.exam_organization_sequence_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT exam_type_sequence_no, exam_subject_sequence_no, problem_number, COUNT(*) AS wrong_count FROM jwland.exam_master WHERE exam_subject_sequence_no = #{examSubjectSequenceNo} GROUP BY exam_type_sequence_no, exam_subject_sequence_no, problem_number ) t1 ON em.exam_type_sequence_no = t1.exam_type_sequence_no AND em.exam_subject_sequence_no = t1.exam_subject_sequence_no AND em.problem_number = t1.problem_number WHERE em.exam_subject_sequence_no = #{examSubjectSequenceNo} AND et.year >= #{start} AND et.year <= #{end} GROUP BY et.year, et.month, eo.exam_organization_name, em.problem_number, t1.wrong_count ORDER BY t1.wrong_count DESC, et.year DESC, et.month DESC, em.problem_number DESC
